title: Niconicomura Organic Vegan Food
description: Vegan organic food shop with a small cafe on the second floor. Serves a fixed lunch set for around 800+yen, and there are small desserts, tea, and coffee. Shop sells organic and vegan-friendly products, including soy meats. The owners follow the macrobiotics diet. Directions: take either the 50 bus to Mochigahama or the 51 bus to Minamiishigaki.
